column4: Ah I see my file management option is here.  The text of the option is a bit misleading imo.  But I have found what I was looking for.
NO NO!  Don't give up and run back to Windoh's yet.
When I worked on campus at M$FT I brought in my XBox with Linux on it...
people were not amused and I was told to take it home immediately
If I found a hiccup in FireFox that seems to only happen on my Warty install, should I file a bug against it?  Or is that a FireFox bug?
